longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a German identity card for children
  ("Kinderausweis") issued to children up to 16 years of age
  (2 passport photos of the child must be available on
  arrival).
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a copy of a pre-arranged visa can obtain a visa
  on arrival. 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Germany will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Warning:
- A yellow fever vaccination certificate may be required for
  those leaving Sierra Leone.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
